metadata.title: CVE-2020-12626 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4. A CSRF attackcan cause an authenticated user to be logged out because POST was notconsidered.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-core - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-mysql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-pgsql - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-plugins - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: roundcube package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2~beta+dfsg.1-0ubuntu1+esm2').
